author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Most of the tests that create a `New-PSSession` do not use the PSv6 endpoint but the default endpoint, which is for Windows Powershell.

The tests are under : https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/test/powershell/engine/Remoting

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.1.0-preview.1
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    v6.1.0-preview.1
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.16299
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: Fix tests for remoting to use the PSv6 configuration endpoint.
